structure.unit: A JUDICIAL SUPPORT AGENCIES AND PERSONNEL

law.catch_line: Forwarding of designations of agencies to circuit clerks.
law.text: All designations made by the Chief Justice pursuant to KRS 27A.600 to 27A.640 shall be forwarded to each circuit clerk for the judicial district or districts which shall be served by the agency designated.
law.history: Created 1994 Ky. Acts ch. 338, sec. 3, effective July 15, 1994.
